mapper.insert: insert into filmbox_store ( product_no , product_name , product_content , product_price , product_img , product_category) values(#{product_no}, #{product_name}, #{product_content}, #{product_price}, #{product_img}, #{product_category})
mapper.select: select product_no, product_name , product_content, product_price , product_img, product_category from filmbox_store

select * from ( select e.*, @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum from ( select product_no , product_name , product_content , product_price , product_img , product_category from filmbox_store fs , (select @rownum := 0) N where 1=1 ) e order by product_no )as A WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
select product_no, product_name , product_content, product_price , product_img, product_category from filmbox_store where product_no = #{product_no}
